overview: Gina, Mike, Big Bird and the Kids host the Sesame Street Dance Along, where they dance and play Sesame Street songs that involve dancing. The DVD came with a CD Sampler that had songs from Kids Favorite Songs 2. Songs are "The Hokey Pokey", "Ta-Ra-Ra Boom-De-Ay" and "If You're Happy and You Know It."
title: Sesame Street: Dance Along!
